long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This script is designed to introduce a visually engaging method for users to interact with stored data in a Chrome environment. It takes advantage of the chrome.storage.local.get API to fetch and display saved data when a button is clicked. Moreover, each button features a unique background image, providing not only functional but also aesthetic enhancement to the webpage.
